attributes.action: Prohibit the two largest supermarket companies taking photographs of car number plates in their car  parks
attributes.additional_details:
Some supermarket   car parks now have CCTV cameras  which record the car registration numbers  of customers.    If a vehicle is recorded as overstaying its welcome,  some  car park operators then request DVLA   to supply the name and address of the registered keeper.            Anecdotal evidence suggests  that  this may  be a rip off  and a scam.

Please prohibit  supermarkets  taking photographs  of car registration numbers.
